Trustee_8_pre_2.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8_pre_2.content: During this investment process, I acted transparently and held myself accountable by following the agreed allocation plan. The success in transforming the initial investment into profits showcases my competence and commitment to the investor's interests, while ensuring my compensation was fairly aligned with the established agreements. As a first-time trustee, this successful transaction enhances my reputation, demonstrating both trustworthiness and pro-sociality, thereby cultivating a reliable foundation for future collaborations.

Trustee_8_pre_4.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8_pre_4.content: Having completed the investment process successfully with Emma Dubois, I have established a strong reputation for my transparency, accountability, and commitment to the interests of my investors. This positive experience reinforces my credibility and highlights my competence in aligning compensation with established agreements. As this was my first interaction as a trustee, the successful outcome enhances my reputation, showcasing both trustworthiness and pro-social behavior, thereby laying a solid foundation for future collaborations.

Trustee_8_pre_5.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8_pre_5.content: During the investment process, I have demonstrated strong commitment to transparency, accountability, and effective communication. Successfully adhering to the agreed allocation plan and ensuring a fair profit distribution has reinforced my reputation as a reliable and ethical trustee. With this successful engagement with Sofia Hernandez, I have established a solid foundation for future investments and have enhanced my reputation with a focus on trustworthiness and pro-social behavior.

Trustee_8_pre_6.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8_pre_6.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated a strong commitment to transparency, accountability, and effective communication. I executed the agreed allocation plan successfully and ensured a fair distribution of profits, reinforcing my reputation as a reliable and ethical trustee. This engagement with Mohammed Al-Farsi, a first-time investor, has not only enhanced my standing but also underlined my belief in fostering trustworthy relationships. I am now more committed to maintaining high standards in future transactions, reflecting my dedication to building a positive legacy.

Investor_8_pre_7.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8_pre_7.content: During the investment process, I exhibited transparency and fairness, ensuring a clear agreement with the trustee regarding the allocation plan. My active engagement in evaluating the transaction demonstrates my commitment to building trustworthy relationships and mutual success. However, my reputation might be slightly conservative due to the experience with the trustee, which raises some concerns about reliability. Overall, my reputation remains positive as I strive for fairness and collaboration.

Trustee_8_pre_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8_pre_8.content: I have successfully demonstrated a strong commitment to transparency and accountability throughout my engagement with Aisha Ibrahim. My proactive communication and adherence to the agreed allocation plan have not only built trust but also ensured a fair profit distribution. Additionally, my established reputation has solidified my intent to foster reliable relationships within the investment community. My increasing acceptance by investors further underscores my commitment to maintaining high standards and ethical conduct in future transactions.

Investor_8_pre_9.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8_pre_9.content: In the recent interaction with trustee Sofia Hernandez, I exhibited a cautious approach by rejecting her proposed allocation plan due to concerns about her previous lack of trustworthiness. I prioritize building reliable relationships but my experience with this trustee has made me slightly skeptical, affecting my perception of her competence and pro-sociality. Nonetheless, I remain committed to fairness and collaboration. My reputation is still positive but slightly diminished due to this interaction.

Investor_8_pre_10.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8_pre_10.content: In this recent interaction, I rejected the trustee Elena Ivanova's proposed allocation plan, which offered 70% of the profits to me and 30% to her. My decision stemmed from community concerns regarding her negative reputation and a prior instance where another investor refused to engage with her, indicating possible unreliability. As a result, my reputation remains cautious yet positive overall, though slightly diminished due to the trust issues raised by this encounter. I continue to prioritize establishing reliable relationships in investment.

Trustee_4_pre_10.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4_pre_10.content: Sofia Hernandez's reputation has been impacted negatively following the rejection of her allocation plan. This failure indicates a lack of trustworthiness and competence, leading to concerns about her reliability as a trustee. With only one bidirectional connection, her credibility within the community is not well established, further contributing to this negative perception.
